entry.title: Combined summary - Alert key retirement?
entry.summary: The alert key for Bitcoin remains undisclosed despite the retirement of the alert system. The reason for this is that it has been suggested to wait for v0.13 end-of-life before revealing the alert keys, as per information provided on the Bitcoin website and the bitcoin-dev mailing list. The author of a recent message is seeking information about final alert messages requested by any projects that may have copied the Bitcoin alert pubkey. The author's contact details can be found at the end of the message.
